name: 張文忠
objective: 本課程將講述生物醫學工程相關之基礎知識，包括人體結構、基礎生理學、生醫材料、生物力學、醫學電子、醫療器材、組織工程、生醫檢測等方面之概念。
schedule:
週次 單元主題
1.Introduction of biomedical engineering 
2.Structures of biomaterials 
3.Properties of biomaterials 
4.Biocompatibility of biomaterials 
5.Biomedical application of biomaterials
6.Tissue engineering
7.Biosensing
8.Biotechnology
9.Midterm exam
10.Hemodynamics
11.Mass transfer in tissue structure
12.Biomechanics 
13.Biomedical signal processing 
14.Final oral presentations (I)
15.Final oral presentations (II)
16.Final oral presentations (III)
17.Final overview
18.Final exam
上述課程內容將依實際上課進度調整
scorePolicy: 期中考: 30% ; 期末考: 40% ; 期末報告及平時表現: 30%
materials:
1.” 生物醫學材料” 王盈錦主編, 合記出版社.
2.” 醫學工程原理與應用”王正一主編, 正中書局.
3.” Introduction to Biomedical Engineering”, Enderle et al.,Academic Press  
4.” Basic Transport Phenomena in Biomedical Engineering” R.L. Fournier, Taylor and Francis, Chapters 5 and 6.
5.” Biomaterials Science, An Introduction to Materials in Medicine,” edited by Buddy..
